text: "I Walk the Line" is a song that was written and recorded by Johnny Cash in 1956. It was the first number one single Cash got. It sold over 2 million copies. Cash said that the song is about his promise to love and care for his wife. ==Chart positions== Chart (1957) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot Country Singles 1 U.S. Billboard Hot 100 17 Category:Johnny Cash songs Category:1956 songs Category:The Everly Brothers songs Category:Live (band) songs Category:Glen Campbell songs Category:Burl Ives songs Category:Rodney Crowell songs Category:Country songs Category:Songs written by Johnny Cash
title: I Walk the Line
